import React from "react"; // src/pages/index.js를 통해서 한번에 import 할 수 있도록 함 import MainTab from "../../../common/MainTab"; import TestImg from "../../../../test/image/img.png" import Footer from "../FooterComp" import {Container, GridList, GridListTile, Grid} from "@material-ui/core"; const ArtView = (props) => { const imgList = [ {name: "testImg", img: TestImg, price: 3000}, {name: "testImg", img: TestImg, price: 3000}, {name: "testImg", img: TestImg, price: 3000}, {name: "testImg", img: TestImg, price: 3000}, {name: "testImg", img: TestImg, price: 3000}, {name: "testImg", img: TestImg, price: 3000}, {name: "testImg", img: TestImg, price: 3000}, {name: "testImg", img: TestImg, price: 3000}, {name: "testImg", img: TestImg, price: 3000}, {name: "testImg", img: TestImg, price: 3000}, {name: "testImg", img: TestImg, price: 3000}, {name: "testImg", img: TestImg, price: 3000}, {name: "testImg", img: TestImg, price: 3000}, {name: "testImg", img: TestImg, price: 3000}, {name: "testImg", img: TestImg, price: 3000}, {name: "testImg", img: TestImg, price: 3000}, {name: "testImg", img: TestImg, price: 3000}, {name: "testImg", img: TestImg, price: 3000}, {name: "testImg", img: TestImg, price: 3000}, {name: "testImg", img: TestImg, price: 3000},] return (
{imgList && imgList.length > 0 && imgList.map((test, idx) => ( {test.name} {test.price + "$"} ))}
); } export default ArtView;
